non_equipment.name: Iron Ballista
non_equipment.raw:
This enters exhausted.
[T]: Deal 2 to a unit at a battlefield.

non_equipment.name: Sun Disc
non_equipment.raw: [T]: [Legion] — The next unit you play this turn enters ready. (Get the effect if you've played another card this turn.)

non_equipment.name: Unlicensed Armory
non_equipment.raw: Discard 1, [T]: Choose a friendly unit. The next time it dies this turn, you may pay [C] to recall it exhausted instead. (Send it to base. This isn't a move.)

non_equipment.name: Ravenborn Tome
non_equipment.raw: [T]: The next spell you play deals 1 Bonus Damage. (Each instance of damage the spell deals is increased by 1.)

non_equipment.name: Mask of Foresight
non_equipment.raw: When a friendly unit attacks or defends alone, give it +1 [S] this turn.

non_equipment.name: Spirit's Refuge
non_equipment.raw:
When you play this, buff a friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 [S] buff.)
Friendly buffed units have [Deflect] if they didn't already. (Opponents must pay [A] to choose those units with a spell or ability.)

non_equipment.name: Solari Shrine
non_equipment.raw: When you kill a stunned enemy unit, you may exhaust this to draw 1.

non_equipment.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
non_equipment.raw:
[Hidden] (Hide now for [A] to react with later for [0].)
The next time a friendly unit would die, kill this instead. Recall that unit exhausted. (Send it to base. This isn't a move.)

non_equipment.name: Orb of Regret
non_equipment.raw: [T]: Give a unit -1 [S] this turn, to a minimum of 1 [S].

non_equipment.name: Energy Conduit
non_equipment.raw: [T]: [Reaction] — [Add] [1]. (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)

non_equipment.name: Garbage Grabber
non_equipment.raw: Recycle 3 from your trash, [1], [T]: Draw 1.

non_equipment.name: Mushroom Pouch
non_equipment.raw: At the start of your Beginning Phase, if you control a facedown card at a battlefield, draw 1.

non_equipment.name: Arena Bar
non_equipment.raw: [T]: Buff an exhausted friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 [S] buff.)

non_equipment.name: Pirate's Haven
non_equipment.raw: When you ready a friendly unit, give it +1 [S] this turn.

non_equipment.name: Mistfall
non_equipment.raw: When you buff a friendly unit, you may pay [C] and exhaust this to ready it.

non_equipment.name: Dazzling Aurora
non_equipment.raw: At the end of your turn, reveal cards from the top of your Main Deck until you reveal a unit. Play it, ignoring its cost, and recycle the rest.

non_equipment.name: Pack of Wonders
non_equipment.raw: [T]: Return another friendly gear, unit, or [Hidden] card to its owner's hand.

non_equipment.name: Scrapheap
non_equipment.raw: When this is played, discarded, or killed, draw 1.

non_equipment.name: The Syren
non_equipment.raw: [1], [T]: Move a friendly unit at a battlefield to its base.

non_equipment.name: Treasure Trove
non_equipment.raw:
When this leaves the board, draw 1 and channel 1 rune exhausted.
[C], [T]: Kill this.

non_equipment.name: Forge of the Future
non_equipment.raw:
When you play this, play a 1 [S] Recruit unit token at your base.
Kill this: Recycle up to 4 cards from trashes.

non_equipment.name: Symbol of the Solari
non_equipment.raw: If a combat where you are the attacker ends in a tie, recall ALL units instead. (Send them to base. This isn't a move. Ties are calculated after combat damage is dealt.)

non_equipment.name: Vanguard Helm
non_equipment.raw: When a buffed friendly unit dies, buff another friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 [S] buff.)

non_equipment.name: Baited Hook
non_equipment.raw: \[1]\[C], [T]: Kill a friendly unit. Look at the top 5 cards of your Main Deck. You may play a unit from among them that has Might up to 1 more than the killed unit, ignoring its cost. Then recycle the rest.

non_equipment.name: Assembly Rig
non_equipment.raw: \[1]\[C], Recycle a unit from your trash, [T]: Play a 3 [S] Mech unit token to your base.

non_equipment.name: Poro Snax
non_equipment.raw:
When you play this, draw 1.
\[1]\[C], [T], Kill this: Draw 1.

non_equipment.name: Heart of Dark Ice
non_equipment.raw: [T]: Give a unit +3 [S] this turn.

non_equipment.name: Chemtech Cask
non_equipment.raw: When you play a spell on an opponent's turn, you may exhaust me to play a Gold gear token exhausted.

non_equipment.name: Temporal Portal
non_equipment.raw: [A], [T]: Give the next spell you play this turn [Repeat] equal to its cost.  (You may pay the additional cost to repeat the spell's effect.)

non_equipment.name: Hextech Anomaly
non_equipment.raw: [T]: [Reaction] — Pay any amount of [A] to [Add] that much Energy.  (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)

non_equipment.raw: When you choose a friendly unit, you may pay [1] and exhaust this to draw 1.

non_equipment.name: Vanguard Armory
non_equipment.raw: [T]: Play three 1 [S] Recruit unit tokens.  (You may play them to different locations.)

non_equipment.name: Altar of Memories
non_equipment.raw: When a friendly unit dies, you may exhaust me to draw 1, then put a card from your hand on the top or bottom of your Main Deck.
